{"id":539912185,"lang":"java","time":"6 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1629210342,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/539912185/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Multiply Strings","memory":"38.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String multiply(String num1, String num2) {\n        int m = num1.length(), n = num2.length();\n        int[] pos = new int[m + n];\n        for (int i = m - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n            for (int j = n - 1; j >= 0; j--) {\n                int mul = (num1.charAt(i) - '0') * (num2.charAt(j) - '0');\n                int p1 = i + j, p2 = i + j + 1;\n                int sum = mul + pos[p2];\n                \n                pos[p1] += sum / 10;\n                pos[p2] = sum % 10;\n            }\n        }\n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        for (int p : pos)\n            if (!(sb.length() == 0 && p == 0))\n                sb.append(p);\n        return sb.length() == 0 ? \"0\" : sb.toString(); \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"multiply-strings"}
